title: Global growth slowing, modest drag on U.S.: Treasury's Mnuchin
text:
Global growth slowing, modest drag on U.S.: Treasury's Mnuchin

Economy 8 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 04:56AM ET)

RIYADH (Reuters) - Global growth is slowing and has modestly impacted the United States, U.S. Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin said on Wednesday, adding the U.S. economy remained strong with good capital inflows. "There is no question that the global economy is slowing down and that has had some modest drag on the U.S. economy," he said at an investment conference in the Saudi capital Riyadh. Mnuchin also said Europe needed to do more on the fiscal and regulatory side to maintain growth.

Global growth slowing, modest drag on U.S.: Treasury's Mnuchin
description: Global growth slowing, modest drag on U.S.: Treasury's Mnuchin
